content.question: <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> <math alttext="negative 1"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math> <math alttext="negative pi over 2"><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="negative fraction numerator square root of 2 over denominator 2 end fraction"><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="negative pi over 4"><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> <math alttext="fraction numerator square root of 2 over denominator 2 end fraction"><mfrac><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="pi over 4"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> <math alttext="pi over 2"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> The table gives values for a function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> at selected values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="fraction numerator 1 over denominator sin x end fraction"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="fraction numerator 1 over denominator cos x end fraction"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
